description: In order to preserve our fisheries for generations to come, we must show our support for native fish and free-flowing rivers. The Wild Waterline Pocket Responsibili-Tee® gets the word out and is made of recycled materials. By utilizing fabric scraps and recycled bottles, we reduce our reliance on virgin raw materials. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Wild Waterline Pocket Responsibili-Tee - Mens

specs.value: 5.6-oz 50% recycled cotton, 50% postconsumer recycled polyester jersey
